channel.title: [help] how do i change my login startup message?
channel.description: When i Login to my Tericscape it says ask to be mod and ur banned ::lupdate now ffor latest updat how do i change that? which .java file is it in.?

item.title: [help] how do i change my login startup message?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

steven1994:

Nope thats just the scroll that comes up when u log in i eman in the chat it says u iwill be banned if u say i wanna be mod and ::lupdate i want to change that not the scroll that come s up when u log in…

I Aren’t showing you about the Scroll!! Mine is about changing the Chat box.

Read full topic
item.source: [help] how do i change my login startup message?

item.title: [help] how do i change my login startup message?
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Lol, there isn’t any sendMessage’s, they’re not used for menus etc. sendQuest’s are in menus. Search for public void MainHelpMenu and the text what it says when you login or type ::help can be changed from that void.

Read full topic

item.source: [help] how do i change my login startup message?

item.title: [help] how do i change my login startup message?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Step 1
Open Client.Java
Then Press CTRL+F
Type the message that shows up when you log in. Click search.

Step 2
It will come up with something like

sendMessage("Welcome to XXXXXScape");

Step 3
Change it to whatever you want, So it might look like this.

sendMessage("Welcome to MyScape Enjoy Your Time");
Be sure only to change the insides of the brackets, Otherwise it can cause errors

Step 4
Save, Compile and Run and it Will be Changed

Note, You can delete any other sendMessages(“XXXXXXX”); That might be under it.

sendMessage("XXXXXXXX"); sendMessage("XXXXXXXX"); sendMessage("XXXXXXXX"); sendMessage("XXXXXXXX");
Can be Changed to

sendMessage("XXXXXXXX");

Read full topic
